data.name: Sample - VMware Tanzu Service Mesh - 1.0.0
data.description: VMware Tanzu® Service Mesh™ is VMware's enterprise-class service mesh solution that provides consistent control and security for microservices, end users, and data—across all your clusters and clouds—in the most demanding multicluster and multicloud environments.

workflows.description: Creates an cluster in VMware Tanzu Service Mesh based on the cluster ID and other input parameters that you have specified.
workflows.name: Create Cluster

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Create Cluster

workflows.description: Generate a security token for a cluster. This token is used to establish a secure connection between Tanzu Service Mesh and the cluster while the cluster is onboarded.
workflows.name: Generate Security Token for Cluster

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Generate Security Token for Cluster

routes.name: Start-> Generate Security Token for Cluster

workflows.description: Install Tanzu Service Mesh or upgrade the version of Tanzu Service Mesh on a cluster.
workflows.name: Install/Upgrade Tanzu Service Mesh Version on Cluster

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Install/Upgrade Tanzu Service Mesh Version on Cluster

steps.name: Install/Upgrade Tanzu Service Mesh Version on Cluster

arguments.name: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh
arguments.operationTitle: Install/Upgrade Tanzu Service Mesh Version on Cluster

routes.name: Start-> Install/Upgrade Tanzu Service Mesh Version on Cluster

workflows.description: Retrieve a list of the clusters onboarded to Tanzu Service Mesh.
workflows.name: Get Clusters List

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Clusters List

workflows.description: Retrieve details of a cluster, including the display name of the cluster in the Tanzu Service Mesh user interface, the version of Kubernetes on the cluster, and its operational status.
workflows.name: Get Clusters Details

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Clusters Details

workflows.description: Retrieve the URL of a registration YAML file. You use this YAML file to register a cluster with Tanzu Service Mesh during onboarding.
workflows.name: Get Cluster Onboard URL

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Cluster Onboard URL

workflows.description: Retrieve the version of Tanzu Service Mesh installed on a cluster, the state of the Tanzu Service Mesh installation, and a list of the versions of Tanzu Service Mesh that are available to upgrade the cluster to.
workflows.name: Get Tanzu Service Mesh Version

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Tanzu Service Mesh Version

routes.name: Start-> Get Tanzu Service Mesh Version

workflows.description: Schedule the fetching of logs of a specified type from a cluster.
workflows.name: Get Cluster Logs

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Cluster Logs

workflows.description: Updates an cluster in VMware Tanzu Service Mesh based on the cluster ID and other input parameters that you have specified.
workflows.name: Update Cluster

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Update Cluster

workflows.description: Remove a cluster from Tanzu Service Mesh based on the cluster ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Cluster from Tanzu Service Mesh

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Remove Cluster from Tanzu Service Mesh

steps.name: Remove Cluster from Tanzu Service Mesh

arguments.name: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh
arguments.operationTitle: Remove Cluster from Tanzu Service Mesh

routes.name: Start-> Remove Cluster from Tanzu Service Mesh

workflows.description: Uninstall Tanzu Service Mesh from a cluster based on the cluster ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Uninstall Tanzu Service Mesh from Cluster

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Uninstall Tanzu Service Mesh from Cluster

steps.name: Uninstall Tanzu Service Mesh from Cluster

arguments.name: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh
arguments.operationTitle: Uninstall Tanzu Service Mesh from Cluster

routes.name: Start-> Uninstall Tanzu Service Mesh from Cluster

workflows.description: Creates an global namespace in VMware Tanzu Service Mesh based on the name and other input parameters that you have specified.
workflows.name: Create Global Namespace

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Create Global Namespace

workflows.description: Retrieve a list of the IDs of defined global namespaces from VMware Tanzu Service Mesh server.
workflows.name: Get Global Namespaces

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Global Namespaces

workflows.description: Retrieve the configuration of a global namespace based on the global namespace ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Global Namespace Details

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Global Namespace Details

workflows.description: Retrieve a list of capabilities enabled for a global namespace and their statuses based on the global namespace ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Capabilities Enabled for Global Namespace

arguments.operationTitle: Get Capabilities Enabled for Global Namespace

routes.name: Start-> Get Capabilities Enabled for Global Namespace

workflows.description: Retrieve the status of a specified capability enabled for a global namespace based on the global namespace ID and capability that you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Status for Capability Enabled for Global Namespace

arguments.name: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh
arguments.operationTitle: Get Status for Capability Enabled for Global Namespace

routes.name: Start-> Get Status for Capability Enabled for Global Namespace

workflows.description: Retrieve a list of the member services in a global namespace based on the global namespace ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Member Services in Global Namespace

arguments.operationTitle: Get Member Services in Global Namespace

workflows.description: Update an global namespace in VMware Tanzu Service Mesh based on the cluster ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.description: Delete a global namespace in VMware Tanzu Service Mesh based on the global namespace ID that you have specified.

workflows.description: Retrieve a list of jobs from VMware Tanzu Service Mesh server.
workflows.name: Get Jobs List

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Jobs List

workflows.description: Retrieve the details of a job, including the status of a job based on the job ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Job Details

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Get Job Details

workflows.description: Download a job based on the job ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Download Job

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Download Job

workflows.description: Delete a job based on the job ID that you have specified.
workflows.name: Delete Job

arguments.title: VMware Tanzu Service Mesh: Delete Job

workflows.description: Retrieve a list of resource groups of a specified type, with configuration details for each group based on the type and other input parameter that you have specified.
